--- Ikoto / Pacifix / Crossroads / Swoop ---

Pacifix smiles at Crotale, but his next action is cut short as an 
EMP blast hits both ships, and an invisible force, draws both the 
Autobots and the Decepticons into the maelstorm, side by side.

Pacifix is knocked out by the EMP as it courses through the ship. 
In the room surrounding him, both Crossroads and Swoop find the 
same fate as he. He remembers looking at Crotale as the EMP 
hits, then blackness, and a sense of enternal silence and solitude 
after he hits the ground, and thier ship is then drawn into the 
maelstorm.

The Ikoto immediately close the maelstorm vortex to avoid drawing 
more power than needed. Azafroth then speaks wordlessly to the 
Ikoto present, "It is done. Now the game begins." He and the Ikoto 
simultaneously time warp, all arriving at earth. The begin drawing 
on stored power, and they open up a exit to their previous time 
warp whirlpool. 

Visible to future Europe, Africa, and Asia, a flash ignites the sky, 
and two fireballs can be seen splitting off, and heading in different 
directions. Pacifix is thrown into a wall, and starts to regain 
consciousness. Crossroads and Swoop also begin to come to, 
though in totally different locations.

oOc: Gunthers, where was your ship going down?

One of the two ships heads towards the island chains of central 
Indonesia. Inside that ship, autobots begin waking up.

ooC: I'll let other people post for the entrance, before crashing. =)
